Defines

Message functions
Use these to generate various levels of messages. The messages that are actually sent depend on the verbosity level of the library.

#define fc_printfErrorMessage(message,...)
 Print an error message to stderr.
#define fc_printfWarningMessage(message,...)
 Print a warning message to stdout.
#define fc_printfLogMessage(message,...)
 Print a log message to stdout.
#define fc_printfDebugMessage(message,...)
 Print a debug message to stdout.

Functions

FC_ReturnCode fc_setLibraryVerbosity (FC_VerbosityLevel verbosity)
 Set the library verbosity level.
FC_VerbosityLevel fc_getLibraryVerbosity (void)
 Get the current verbosity level of the library.
FC_ReturnCode fc_initLibrary (void)
 Setup Feature Characterization Library for use.
FC_ReturnCode fc_finalLibrary (void)
 Cleanup when done using Feature Characterization Library.
